body_content.explanation: sudden and unexpected, and often unpleasant:
examples: Our conversation came to an abrupt end when George burst into the room.
There was an abrupt change in her attitude towards me when she heard that I was Alan's girlfriend
The car juddered and came to an abrupt halt in the middle of the road.
The road ended in an abrupt (= sudden and very steep) slope down to the sea.

body_content.explanation: using too few words when talking, in a way that seems rude and unfriendly:
examples: He is sometimes very abrupt with clients.
